articles.title: DOST Launches AI-Powered Disaster Early Warning System
articles.description: The Department of Science and Technology unveils revolutionary artificial intelligence system that can predict natural disasters 72 hours in advance, potentially saving thousands of lives across the Philippines.

articles.title: PAGASA Issues Weather Advisory for Approaching Tropical Depression
articles.description: The Philippine Atmospheric, Geophysical and Astronomical Services Administration warns of potential flooding in low-lying areas as a tropical depression approaches the eastern seaboard.

articles.title: NDRRMC Conducts Nationwide Earthquake Drill
articles.description: Millions of Filipinos participate in simultaneous earthquake drill across all regions, testing emergency response protocols and improving disaster preparedness coordination nationwide.

articles.title: Philippine Space Program Achieves New Milestone
articles.description: DOST announces successful deployment of advanced Earth observation satellite, enhancing disaster monitoring capabilities and providing real-time data for weather forecasting.

articles.title: Climate Data Shows Rising Sea Temperatures
articles.description: Latest oceanographic data from PAGASA reveals significant warming trends in Philippine waters, affecting marine ecosystems and weather patterns nationwide.

articles.title: Emergency Communication System Upgraded Nationwide
articles.description: NDRRMC deploys new satellite-based communication network ensuring uninterrupted emergency coordination during disasters, providing backup when traditional networks fail.

articles.title: Breakthrough in Renewable Energy Research
articles.description: Filipino scientists at DOST develop innovative solar panel technology with 40% higher efficiency, promising cheaper clean energy for households and businesses.

articles.title: Flood Preparedness Campaign Launched
articles.description: NDRRMC launches comprehensive public awareness campaign educating communities on flood risks and evacuation procedures ahead of the rainy season.
